com.SoftWoehr.FIJI
Class FijiFrame

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--java.awt.Component
        |
        +--java.awt.Container
              |
              +--java.awt.Window
                    |
                    +--java.awt.Frame
                          |
                          +--javax.swing.JFrame
                                |
                                +--com.SoftWoehr.FIJI.FijiFrame
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.swing.WindowConstants
public class FijiFrame
extends javax.swing.JFrame

The Frame inside which a FIJI Panel opens. FijiFrame has the hooks to the application controller and also to the panel controller for the FijiPanel it contains.

Version:
$Id: FijiFrame.java,v 1.1.1.1 2001/08/21 02:35:53 jwoehr Exp $
Author:
jax
See Also:

may_i_close

protected boolean may_i_close()
Ask panel controller if one may close.
Returns:
True if panel controller thinks it's okay to close.

may_i_exit

protected boolean may_i_exit()
Ask application controller if one may exit.
Returns:
True if application controller thinks it's okay for FIJI to exit.

may_i_system_exit

protected boolean may_i_system_exit()
Ask app controller if it's okay to call System.exit() on exiting FIJI. This allows FIJI to be launched from a toolbar without closing the toolbar when FIJI exits.
Returns:
True if System.exit() should be called on FIJI exit.
